title: Dark Mode
body: 'Oww, my eyes!' I hear you cry. Or perhaps not as on this site the infamous 'dark mode' has been implemented and it even confirms to your personal browser settings. Let's take a look to see how it was done.

title: How to search
body: In this article we discover how to search and ultimately find what we're looking for.
